name: Meigas & Bruxas
description:
If you're waiting between the ways and you feel the cold in your neck, beware for your Soul, because the Santa Compaña is comming.

In the forest of the northwest of Iberia, meigas and bruxas fight for the future of the human being. Meigas waits in the way,

cursing poor people to give them to the Santa Compaña. Bruxas hear the voice of the wretch and tries to save your soul just

one more day...

Made for the GAMERella 2016 game jam.

The theme was 'Intersection' and we combined it with the Spanish's legend of Santa Compaña. Hope you like our game!! (and learned a new legend ;) )

Credits:

  • Cristina Ramos (@SaffronCR): programming
  • Alicia Guardeño (@AliciaGuardeno): programming
  • Andie Sacchi (@Mahatmandie): Art & animation
  • Marta Gil (@Matlahvi): design & art
